document.full_text: one man was shot dead and a second wounded after a group of illegal entrants from mexico came under fire from suspected bandits in desert south of phoenix, authorities said on thursday.
document.title: one dead, one injured in arizona desert shooting
lines_and_colors: one man was shot dead and a second wounded after a group of illegal entrants from mexico came under fire from suspected bandits in desert south of phoenix, authorities said on thursday.
